EmailTemplate.subject: Our Lowest Price of 2019 Is Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <!-- ${CTAText} <!-- <[[${CTALink}]]> Save Up To 40% OFF Cleaning and Breakroom Timothy's Single-Serve Coffee K-Cup Pods, Pumpkin Spice Flavoured Shop Now Swiffer Unscented Duster Kit Shop Now Energizer Max Long-Life "AAA" Alkaline Batteries Shop Now Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Big Deals Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 *Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
